translation.text: Template Winter Session Schedule/ J-Term 2023

Tuesday, January 3rd Through Thursday, January 12th, 2023 /br /br We Will Provide The Following Service: /br /br Shuttle Service: /br u Tuesday Jan 3rd Thursday Jan 12th /u /br Monday - Friday /br /br Quad SEC Direct /br 7:00am 7:40pm /br 20 minute frequencies /br /br Allston Campus /br 7:00AM 10:30PM /br 30 minute frequencies /br /br 7 Days A Week /br Crimson Cruiser, 1636 er /br 8:15AM 12:20AM /br /br u Saturday Jan 7th, Jan 8th Sunday Jan14th /u /br SEC Weekend /br 10:45am 6:45pm /br 30 minute frequencies /br /br u Tuesday Jan 3rd Thursday Jan 12th /u /br Daytime Van Service: /br Monday - Friday /br 08:30AM 7:00PM /br Saturday - Sunday /br 12:30PM 7:00PM /br /br Evening Van Service: /br Monday - Friday /br 08:30AM 7:00PM /br Saturday - Sunday /br 12:30PM 7:00PM /br /br Happy New Year /br -Transit Services
Template President's Day 2023

Monday, February 20th br/ We will provide the following service: /br /br Shuttle Service: /br Crimson Cruiser /br 8:15AM-4:23PM br/ /br 1636 er /br 4:20PM-12:25AM br/ /br Monday Morning and Tuesday Morning br/ Extended Overnight /br 12:40AM-3:52AM br/ /br Daytime Van Service: No Day Time Van Service br/ Evening Van Service: No Evening Van Service br/ br/ Enjoy the long weekend
SEC 2

11/27/2023 Due to unforeseen circumstances, we will run with reduced schedule this morning on the SEC 2 route We apologize for the inconvenience. /br /br For shuttle schedules and more information, please contact our office at a href tel: 1617-495-0400 (617) 495-0400 /a or visit our a href https://www.transportation.harvard.edu/shuttle-van-services/shuttles-schedule/morning-afternoon-monday-friday website. /a /br /br Also consider utilizing our evening van service and download our evening van app a href https://www.transportation.harvard.edu/shuttle-van-services/demand-van-service here. /a /br /br Thank you for choosing our service.
Template Additional Weekend Exam Shuttle

Weekend Exam Shuttles will be available on Saturday, May 6th, 2023 and Saturday, May 13th, 2023. /br /br Shuttle Service: /br /br Exam Mather Express /br 8:10AM 4:00PM /br 10 minute frequencies /br /br Exam Quad Express /br 8:10AM 4:00PM /br 10 minute frequencies /br /br 1636 er /br 4:20PM 12:25AM /br 20 minute frequencies /br /br Allston Campus PM /br 5:00PM 7:55PM /br 20 minute frequencies /br /br Daytime Van Service: /br 08:00AM 7:00PM /br /br Evening Van Service: /br 07:00PM 3:00AM /br Last call 02:15AM /br /br Good Luck on your Exams /br -Transit Services
Senior Week & Reunion service 2023

Template First Year Week

Sunday, August 27th Through Thursday, August 31st, 2023 /br /br Please note that on Friday, September 1st all fixed route shuttle service will be suspended from 7:00AM-7:00PM to support the Day of Service. /br /br Full Service will begin on Tuesday September 5th. /br /br We Will Provide The Following Service: /br /br Shuttle Service: /br u Monday Thursday /u /br Quad SEC Direct /br 7:00am 7:00pm /br 20 minute frequencies /br /br u Monday Thursday /u /br Allston Campus /br 7:00AM 7:00PM /br 30 minute frequencies /br /br u 7 days a week /u /br Crimson Cruiser, 1636 er /br 8:15AM 12:20AM /br /br Daytime Van Service: /br u Monday Friday /u /br 8:00AM 4:00PM /br /br Evening Van Service: /br u 7 days a week /u /br 4:00PM - 12:00AM /br /br Welcome to Harvard -Transit Services

Please note that due to an emergency, from 1:10 through 4:30, departures will be every 20 minutes. Quad -Sec is running on schedule.
Thanksgiving Service

We Will Provide The Following Service: /br /br Shuttle Service: /br u Wednesday the 22nd /u /br Full Service /br /br u Thursday the 23rd /u /br Thanksgiving Service /br 11:15AM-6:45PM /br 35 minute frequencies /br Quad - Memorial Hall - Mather House /br /br u Saturday the 25th /u /br Full Service /br /br Daytime Van Service: /br u Wednesday the 22nd /u /br Full Service /br /br u Thursday the 23rd- Saturday the 25th /u /br No Service /br /br u Sunday the 26th /u /br Starting at Noon /br /br Evening Van Service: /br u Wednesday the 22nd /u /br Full Service /br /br u Thursday the 23rd- Friday the 25th /u /br No Service /br /br u Saturday the 25th /u /br Full Service /br /br

App Update

Attention all users, please note that PassioGo has released an app update within the past few weeks with improvements. Please make sure you have the most up to date application by visiting your mobile devices app store.
Quad - SEC
Please excuse a moment of limited service for the Quad - SEC run, we will be back up and running shortly.
Announcement on Service Interruptions

Monday, December, 7th ,2023 /br /br Delays: br/ Quad Yard br/ br/ Due to an automobile accident all shuttle routes are currently delayed. first responders have blocked Harvard Sq. br/ br/ For shuttle schedules and more information, please contact our office at a href tel: 1617-495-0400 (617) 495-0400 /a or visit our a href https://www.transportation.harvard.edu/shuttle-van-services/shuttles-schedule/morning-afternoon-monday-friday website. /a /br /br Also, consider utilizing our free evening van service and download our evening van app a href https://www.transportation.harvard.edu/shuttle-van-services/demand-van-service here. /a /br /br Thank you for your patience and choosing our service.

Winter Service
Transit Services will be closed from 12/22/23-1/1/23 /br /br We will return in 2024 with J-Term service. Happy Holidays and a Happy New Year
Limited Service
12/19/2023 We will be running the following routes with limited service today. Quad Sec.
QUAD RIDERS
Please note that due to construction, QUAD shuttles will be picking up riders on Shepard St.
Phone line 617-495-0400

01/05/24 /br /br Due to unforeseen circumstances, Our office phone line 617-495-0400 is not in service. The phone line department works hard to put it back in ASAP. /br /br We apologize for the inconvenience. /br /br
ATTENTION ALL RIDERS

Please note that PassioGo is working on improving their real time ETA's to be more accurate. While this update is in progress please refer to the bus schedule as well as the movement of the bus icons on the map. For shuttle schedules and more information, please contact our office at a href tel: 1617-495-0400 (617) 495-0400 /a or visit our a href https://www.transportation.harvard.edu/shuttle-van-services/shuttles-schedule/morning-afternoon-monday-friday website. /a /br /br Thank you for your understanding.
QUAD Express
Please excuse our delay, the QUAD Express is running with delays until 2:10PM.
Delays

Shuttles are currently running with delays due to traffic resulting from the MBTA red line closure. /br For assistance please call a href tel:617-495-0400 617-495-0400 /a or visit a href https://www.transportation.harvard.edu/shuttle-van-services our website /a for more information.
Presidents Day 2/19/24

Please note that in observation of Presidents Day, Transit services will run the following service Monday 2/19/24. /br /br Shuttle Service: /br Crimson Cruiser, 1636 er /br 8:15AM 12:20AM /br /br Daytime Van Service: /br Closed /br /br Evening Van Service: /br Closed /br /br We will resume full academic service starting Tuesday 2/20/24. /br -Transit Services
Shuttle Delays

Thursday, February 21st, 2024 /br /br Attention Passengers: Shuttles are currently running with delays due to traffic resulting from the MBTA Red Line issues. Please be aware that due to the extensive number of MBTA shuttle buses, we will not be able to layover at Widener Gate. Our shuttle buses will pick-up/drop-off and immediately proceed to their next stop. Please consider arriving prior to the scheduled time in order to avoid missing our shuttle. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you. /br /br For shuttle schedules and more information, please contact our office at a href tel: 1617-495-0400 (617) 495-0400 /a or visit our a href https://www.transportation.harvard.edu/shuttle-van-services/shuttles-schedule/morning-afternoon-monday-friday website. /a /br /br Also consider utilizing our evening van service and download our evening van app a href https://www.transportation.harvard.edu/shuttle-van-services/demand-van-service here. /a /br /br Thank you for choosing our service.
QUAD - SEC Delay
Due to a mechanical issue, there will be delays on the QUAD-SEC route. We are working to rectify the issue as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.
MBTA Red Line Closure 2/24/24-2/25/24

Saturday, February 24th, 2024 /br /br Attention Passengers: Shuttles are currently running with delays due to traffic resulting from the MBTA Red Line issues. The MBTA is closing portions of the Red Line for track repair and replacing the service with shuttle connections. For more information about this closure please visit the a href https://www.mbta.com/diversions/alternative-travel-options-during-red-line-closures MBTA website /a . /br br/ Please note that this will have impacts on local traffic and select shuttle stop locations. Shuttles may run with delays at high traffic hours. /br /br From 2/24/24-2/25/24 our shuttle service will be affected at the following locations: /br Widner-Gate: Widner Gate shuttle stop will be used by MBTA shuttle service. To accommodate the large influx of bus traffic, the Harvard shuttles will be relocating to the back of the bus loading zone, left after exiting Widner Gate. /br /br For assistance please call a href tel:617-495-0400 617-495-0400 /a , we are available 7AM-3AM weekdays and 12PM-3AM weekends.
Stadium (Northbound)

Due to construction on North Harvard St, the bus stop is currently inaccessible. Please wait in the shuttle stop and be cautious when boarding the bus as it will not be able to pull fully into the egress.
